about.name: Will Podbela
about.title: Stusent @ Boston College
about.bio: Will Podbela is a senior at Boston College from Long Island, NY. He is graduating this May with a degree in Computer Science and will be working at Bank of America in New York. His primary interest is in building web applications.

news.title: Completed summer internship for Bank of America
Arrived at Boston College for senior year
Enrolled in Web Application Development course

projects.title: EngineEars
description: This was a freelance project I did over quarantine before my internship from April to June. I assisted in building the front-end of this website using React and Material UI.

projects.title: The Rotation
description: Hired part-time as the 2nd employee of The Rotation fashion rental startup
Implemented new single-page React application to replace outdated Ruby on Rails front-end
Took website from simple landing page to having feature parity with the iOS app, giving customers the ability to browse the catalog, make reservations, and manage their account from the website
Refactored Rails back-end to create and modify API endpoints as needed
Collaborated with UI designer to create components based on InVision and Figma prototypes
Participated in weekly huddle meetings with the team to give progress updates, showcase new features, and discuss next steps

projects.title: 8-Bit Multiplier
description: This was a project I completed in my Computer Organization class. Click on the link above to watch my explanation and demonstration of the project.
